description: Try our easy to follow Crab Salad With Grapefruit And Coriander recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Crab Salad With Grapefruit And Coriander
name: Crab Salad With Grapefruit And Coriander Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: When ready to serve, drizzle the salad with the remaining dressing. Divide the crabmeat among the plates, spooning it neatly on top of the leaves. Scatter over the remaining coriander, and serve immediately.
